description: Students have a minimum age requirement.
violationMessage: Student must be at least 14 years old

description: SSN must be a string of 9 numbers.
violationMessage: SSN is improperly formatted. Type your SSN as a string of 9 numbers. No dashes, no other characters.

description: Household numbers have to make sense
violationMessage: Cannot have more people in household in college than total people in the household.

description: State code must correspond to valid state code
violationMessage: State must be a two-letter code (e.g. VA).
